attributes.action: Ban Christmas advertising until the 1st of December
attributes.additional_details:
It is time for the government to ban the advertising of Christmas until the 1st of December.
Christmas is becoming too commercialised and is ruining the joy of the festive period.
Christmas is supposed to be a religious festival and due to the mass commercialism, it is being ruind.
The state should correct  this and preserve the true values of Christmas.
